entry.title: Install redis in Ubuntu Linux
entry.content:
Since the version of redis-server in Ubuntu is too old, so we need to install it from a PPA repository.

sh Install redis-server from Chris Lea's PPA $ sudo add-apt-repository ppa:chris-lea/redis-server $ sudo apt-get update $ sudo apt-get install redis-server $ redis-cli redis 127.0.0.1:6379> INFO redis_version:2.4.15 ... ...
